{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tin Tower |image = [[File:Tin Tower.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Tin Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northeast of Ecruteak City. }} '''Tin Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pok√©mon & Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !!
